pages.title: Iron Plates
pages.text: Iron plates are the most basic material in Beyond Earth. It's created by crafting iron ingots and a hammer in a crafting table. It's used to craft the simplest machines required to build a rocket and get into space.

pages.title: Compressed Steel
pages.text: Compressed steel is the main component in the tier one rocket and in many important machines. It's created by compressing steel ingots in a compressor, which can be powered by a coal generator. Be sure to collect lots of compressed steel, as you will need it throughout your space travels.
